[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Banner” module_class=”torn-edge” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(223,217,191,0.76)” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2018/08/BG_films.jpg” custom_margin=”||||false|false”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_enable_color=”off” z_index=”2″ max_width_phone=”100%” max_width_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_margin=”15vh||15vh||true|false” custom_margin_tablet=”8vh||8vh||true|false” custom_margin_phone=”0vh||0vh||true|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||||false|false” module_alignment_tablet=”left” module_alignment_phone=”center” module_alignment_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_margin__hover_enabled=”off|hover”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text module_class=”opening-header-short” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”77px” header_font_size_tablet=”70px” header_font_size_phone=”44px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Websites

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Title” module_class=”title-body” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”Roboto Condensed|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#616161″ header_font_size=”34px” header_letter_spacing=”10px” header_line_height=”38px” header_2_font=”|300|||||||”]

Websites

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/FTND.jpg” url=”http://www.fightthenewdrug.org” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed”]

Fight the New Drug

Fight the New Drug exists to provide individuals with the opportunity to make an informed decision regarding pornography by raising awareness of its harmful effects using science, facts and personal accounts.

www.fightthenewdrug.org

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Culture-reframed.jpg” url=”http://www.culturereframed.org” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed”]

Culture Reframed Parents Program

Kids are just a click away from hypersexualized media and porn. That’s why Culture Reframed has developed a complete, best-practice toolkit, helping you to raise porn-resilient kids. The Parents Program is online, free, and accessible. parents.culturereframed.org[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/eChildHood.jpg” url=”http://www.echildhood.org” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”4.9.6″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” hover_enabled=”0″ border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed” sticky_enabled=”0″]

e-childhood

E-Childhood is a registered health promotion charity dedicated to mobilising responses that reduce the harmful effects of pornography on children and young people. Join the Aotearoa eChildhood movement. echildhood.org/nz_sign_up[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Safe-Surfer.jpg” url=”http://www.safesurfer.co.nz” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px”]

SafeSurfer

SafeSurfer is a New Zealand-based social enterprise company that has set up innovative software filtering solutions for home and devices such as phones, laptops, tablets and TVs. www.safesurfer.co.nz [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Its-time-we-talked.jpg” url=”http://www.itstimewetalked.com” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed”]

It’s time we talked

It’s time we talked offers a range of resources for young people, families, schools and community organisations on the potential harms of porn for young people, and strategies to start conversations and create change. www.itstimewetalked.com [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Collective-shout.jpg” url=”http://www.collectiveshout.org” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed”]

Collective Shout

Collective Shout is an Australian grassroots campaigns movement against the objectification of women and the sexualisation of girls. www.collectiveshout.org [/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://tlpprod.wpengine.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/Porn-Help.jpg” url=”http://www.pornhelp.org” url_new_window=”on” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text admin_label=”Intro Text” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_4_text_color=”#4b858e” header_4_font_size=”24px” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” border_color_right=”#4b858e” border_style_right=”dashed”]

PornHelp

PornHelp’s mission is to help people who want to stop using porn take the first step. They offer a comprehensive, unbiased and regularly-updated collection of information about different ways to quit porn.

www.pornhelp.org

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” module_class=”footer-quote-block” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#F6F3EF” z_index=”2″ custom_margin=”||-15vh||false|false” custom_padding=”80px|80px|80px|80px|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”|20px|20px|20px|false|true” global_colors_info=”{%22gcid-1b27fc3d-7579-4286-975a-244b5a16c6f4%22:%91%93,%22gcid-a394b62d-6ad6-4a00-840a-6f56a4918f0b%22:%91%93}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.9.4″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_line_height=”1.9em” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”15px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]Yeah, I think porn can skew a lot of young people’s views on what sex actually is like. But now that it is so large that people think that does just happen in real life now, you know, and now everyone actually expects that over what is actually happening.”[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.9.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#333333″ text_font_size=”14px” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]— NZ female, 17 yrs[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.9.6″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” background_color_gradient_end_position=”30%” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”http://thelightproject.co.nz/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/website-footer-banner.jpg” width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” height_tablet=”500px” height_phone=”500px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” make_fullwidth=”on”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” _builder_version=”4.9.4″ height=”800px” height_tablet=”300px” height_phone=”200px” height_last_edited=”on|phone” max_height_tablet=”300px” max_height_phone=”200px” max_height_last_edited=”on|desktop”]  [/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

That’s why Culture […]
